    GameEvent - Interface in edu.uw.tcss.game.model
    Sealed interface representing type-safe events for the game's PropertyChangeListener framework.
    GameEvent.InvalidMoveEvent - Record Class in edu.uw.tcss.game.model
    Event fired when an invalid move is attempted.
    GameEvent.MoveEvent - Record Class in edu.uw.tcss.game.model
    Event fired when a valid move is made in any direction.
    GameEvent.NewGameEvent - Record Class in edu.uw.tcss.game.model
    Event fired when a new game is started.
